body_html:
It's a bit of a hail mary, but you could try using the memory-mapping approach to get around the 2GB limit, as described here:
https://petewarden.com/2016/09/27/tensorflow-for-mobile-poets/

I've no idea if that will actually work in this case though.

body:
It's a bit of a hail mary, but you could try using the memory-mapping approach to get around the 2GB limit, as described here:
https://petewarden.com/2016/09/27/tensorflow-for-mobile-poets/

I've no idea if that will actually work in this case though.
